steps.text: Unlike the other guards you've come across, this guard seems to be visibly upset.
"Move along citizen... or don't. I don't care anymore"
steps.title: Guard

steps.text: "It's just that... oh you wouldn't understand..."
steps.title: Guard

choices.text: "I might understand better than you know"

steps.text: The guard slumps against his spear and audibly sighs
"It's that damn sexy goblin. I used to be posted right next to him. I could spend my whole shift looking at those delicious hips."
steps.title: Guard

steps.text: "Now I'm stuck here, where there isn't anything sexy"
steps.title: Guard
